title: 3070 and XSeg training
body:
Any chance of fixing this - Pagefile is too small to complete the operation? I tried full clean windows reinstall, different CUDA, different drivers, making pagefile 64-128GB(my ram is 32GB). Tried all build versions and Nothing. I just get this all the time.

Running trainer.

Model first run.

Choose one or several GPU idxs (separated by comma).

[CPU] : CPU
  [0] : GeForce RTX 3070

[0] Which GPU indexes to choose? :
0

[wf] Face type ( h/mf/f/wf/head ?:help ) :
wf
[4] Batch_size ( 2-16 ?:help ) :
4
